JGrapes API

An event driven component framework.

Packages 
Package Description
org.jgrapes.core
Defines the interfaces and classes that provide the core functionality of the JGrapes event driven component framework.

org.jgrapes.util.events  

An event driven component framework.

JGrapes

JGrapes is an event driven component framework. It consists of three packages.

org.jgrapes.core
This package provides the basic mechanisms for defining components and for handling events. See the package description for details.
